comments.body:
Don't you want to do the same for Overwrite? 
Also, yes, this is cleaner if you do two levels of pattern matching. Match for Append, Overwrite, and in the other cases, check if it exists and then match for the rest of the cases. No need for a lazy val.
EDIT: no that's wrong, nevermind. I think the current change is good.
nit: we can simply put false here instead of `_`. It is more clearer.
@viirya I just kept the existing code for these since I didn't want to make unnecessary changes.
